statements: SELECT * FROM encryption_keys;
SELECT key_name, key_value FROM encryption_keys ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT id, key_name FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_name = 'master_key';
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT id, key_name FROM encryption_keys WHERE updated_at IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys;
SELECT id, key_name, key_value, created_at FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_name LIKE '%secret%';
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT key_name, COUNT(id) AS total_keys FROM encryption_keys GROUP BY key_name HAVING COUNT(id) > 1;
SELECT id, key_name, key_value FROM encryption_keys WHERE updated_at IS NULL ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys;
SELECT key_name FROM encryption_keys WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, key_value FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT component_name, component_type FROM authentication_components ORDER BY component_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM authentication_components WHERE component_key_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT key_name, key_value FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_name LIKE '%secret%';
SELECT * FROM authentication_components WHERE component_type = 'authentication' AND component_key_id > 5;
SELECT key_name, created_at FROM encryption_keys WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY key_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM authentication_components LEFT JOIN encryption_keys ON authentication_components.component_key_id = encryption_keys.id;
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys;
SELECT key_id, key_value FROM encryption_keys WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT key_id, key_value, created_at FROM encryption_keys ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM encryption_logs WHERE action = 'encrypt';
SELECT log_id, timestamp FROM encryption_logs WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT key_id, key_value, created_at FROM encryption_keys ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM encryption_logs WHERE action = 'encrypt' AND user_id = '1234' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT setting_id, key_name FROM encryption_settings WHERE created_by = 'admin' AND key_value <> 'default';
SELECT key_id, key_value, created_at, updated_at FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_id IN ('1234', '5678', '91011') ORDER BY key_id;
SELECT * FROM encryption_logs WHERE action = 'decrypt' OR action = 'update' AND timestamp < NOW();
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys;
SELECT key_id, key_value, creation_date FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_id = 1;
SELECT component_name, component_type, last_accessed FROM authentication_components ORDER BY last_accessed DESC;
SELECT key_id, component_id, access_date FROM key_access_logs WHERE key_id = 5 ORDER BY access_date ASC;
SELECT key_id, rotation_date FROM key_rotation_logs WHERE key_id = 2 AND rotation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys;
SELECT key_id, key_value, creation_date FROM encryption_keys WHERE expiration_date IS NULL;
SELECT component_name, component_type, last_accessed FROM authentication_components ORDER BY last_accessed DESC;
SELECT key_id, component_id, access_date FROM key_access_logs WHERE access_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT key_id, rotation_date FROM key_rotation_logs ORDER BY rotation_date;
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys;
SELECT key_name, key_value FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT session_token, expiration_time FROM user_sessions WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT log_id, log_message, timestamp FROM audit_log WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT key_name, key_value FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM user_sessions WHERE expiration_time > CURRENT_TIMESTAMP;
SELECT u.username, COUNT(kp.permission_id) AS num_permissions FROM users u JOIN key_permissions kp ON u.user_id = kp.user_id GROUP BY u.username ORDER BY num_permissions DESC;
